name: HSC SILVER BOOT BADGE for the Runners Up 2022

metadata.name: HSC SILVER BOOT BADGE for the Runners Up 2022
metadata.description: This HYPER SILVER BOOT BADGE is awarded to the eligible holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 in celebration of France's Runners-up of the QATAR 2022 FIFA World Cup.
metadata.criteria: The badge is automatically awarded to the holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) with country property of France at the time of 2022 FIFA World Cup final match.
metadata.evidence: The winner has been proved to be the holder of the Team France NFT(s) of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 at the time of 2022 FIFA World Cup Final Match.
